benchmark_details.name: BYTESIZED 32
benchmark_details.overview: BYTESIZED 32 is a corpus of 32 reasoning-focused text games totaling 20k lines of PYTHON code, aimed at generating explicit, interpretable, and interactive world models of tasks that require scientific and common-sense reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the generation of text games that model common-sense reasoning tasks and to spur further development in expressing the knowledge contained in language models in more formal and interpretable forms.

data.source: Corpus of 32 text games explicitly designed for the evaluation of language models.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the success of generated game code in adhering to technical requirements and user-defined task specifications.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to technical standards and task requirements.
methodology.validation: Validation through agreement between model ratings and expert human assessments.
